title: MD
biography: John P. A. Ioannidis is a Greek-American physician-scientist, writer and Stanford University professor who has made contributions to evidence-based medicine, epidemiology, and clinical research. Ioannidis studies scientific research itself – in other words, meta-research – primarily in clinical medicine and the social sciences.
aiSummary: John Ioannidis is a epidemiology specialist with an H-index of 224 at Stanford University (Member). Has been published in BMJ, Nature reviews. Neuroscience, Nature Human Behaviour. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
